item.title: janreggie.github.io: internals of janreggie's sandbox
item.description: janreggie’s sandbox is built using Hugo   , bootstrap-bp-hugo-theme   , external fonts, and tears and sweat from the author   . In this post I describe the steps I made in building this website.

item.title: randomquoter: Random Quote Machine
item.description: In this post, I talk about randomquoter, a random quote machine, which is the first project of five for the “Front End Libraries” certification in freeCodeCamp, wherein I used create-react-app to bootstrap my React application as well as TypeScript to greatly improve type safety.
